*div1 type="summary"* *p*David G. Burnet to Austin, Louisville, Ky., December 5, 1829. Suggesting a contract with the Mexican Government for exclusive navigation of Brazos and Colorado Rivers with steam.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Louisville */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="12-05-1829">5 Decr 1829*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*My Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I have accompanied our *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Genl Fullerton*/person_mentioned* this far and shall return probably this *date_mentioned n="12-05-1829">afternoon */date_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Cincinnati*/location_mentioned*— I have suggested to the *person_mentioned*General */person_mentioned*a speculation which I think promises great benefits and I have no doubt of its practicability— It is the procuring the exclusive right of navigating the *location_mentioned*Texas waters*/location_mentioned* Say the *location_mentioned*Colorado*/location_mentioned* the *location_mentioned*Brasos */location_mentioned*and the *location_mentioned*Trinity */location_mentioned*by Steam—The *person_mentioned*Genl*/person_mentioned* and myself would be happy to unite with you in this [s]cheme if the monopoly could be obtained 20 or 25 years or even for 15 years it would be an immense affair Should the *location_mentioned*U. S*/location_mentioned* get the *location_mentioned*territory*/location_mentioned*— Should you think well of the proposition you are hereby authorized to sign my name to a petition to that effect— I beg you will think seriously of the matter—and if you do will summon up all your ingenuity in drafting a petition so as [not] to leave a single flaw for the jealousy of this government to pick at— It should [be] So drawn as to embrace not only the *location_mentioned*rivers */location_mentioned*but all passes and passages from one *location_mentioned*river */location_mentioned*to the other—the *location_mentioned*Netchez */location_mentioned*might also be included— I have only time to hint at this matter—*person_mentioned*Genl Fullerton*/person_mentioned* will explain my views more fully to you— in haste*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*David G. Burnet */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
San Felipe
*/div1*
